title: Exploring Future Continuous Tense
objectives: Understand Future Continuous at Beginner level
Apply Future Continuous in real conversations

vocabulary.definition: Will be + verb-ing to show ongoing future action
vocabulary.example: I will be working at 5 pm.
He will be studying during the weekend.
They will be watching TV while cooking.
I will be making progress on my project.

content.introduction: Welcome to this lesson on Future Continuous.
content.explanation: In this lesson, you will learn about Future Continuous at the Beginner level.
tips: Practice Future Continuous daily for best results.

exercises.question: Choose the correct sentence:
options: I will be cooking dinner at 7 pm.
I will cook dinner at 7 pm.
I will cook dinner at 7 pm.

exercises.question: Describe what you will be doing at a specific future time.

culturalNote: Future Continuous is often used in American movies and TV to depict characters engaged in activities at specific future moments.
